statements: DELETE FROM employee_schedule WHERE employee_id = 101 AND work_day = '2023-01-05'
DELETE FROM employee_schedule WHERE work_shift = 'Morning' AND work_assignment LIKE '%Manager%'
DELETE FROM employee_schedule WHERE id = 1 AND date = '2022-01-05'
DELETE FROM work_assignment WHERE task_id = 101 AND date >= '2022-02-01' AND date < '2022-02-28'
DELETE FROM WorkAssignment WHERE assignment_date = '2022-08-15' AND employee_id = 100;
DELETE FROM employee_schedule WHERE employee_id = 101 AND shift_start_time = '2022-01-20 08:00:00';
DELETE FROM assignment WHERE employee_id = 200 AND shift_id = 300;
